room_title: Escape room "The Lab" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: We had a great time and I highly recommend it. We can't wait to go back and try more rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Lab" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: Amazing well done can't wait to try another room! Highly recommend trying it out!

room_title: Escape room "The Lab" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: Our group had so much fun in the Game Room! The puzzles were definitely challenging but we did escape with 3 minutes to spare! The staff members were all very professional but entertaining. I would highly recommend it anyone looking for fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Lab" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: We had a fantastic time in the lab room! Would recommend to people of all ages!

room_title: Escape room "The Lab" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: Absolutely loved it. We did the lab and escaped, we are eager to come back to try the other rooms. Definitely well worth the money!

room_title: Escape room "The Lab" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: Everything was so awesome! From the staff to the amazing props and puzzles! I would highly recommend the Game Room!

room_title: Escape room "The Lab" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: Wasn't really sure what to expect, but was blown away by the amazing experience. My brother and I participated with two other people. I was a little worried about collaborating with people that we just met but with everyone focused on the task at hand, there was no time for an awkward initial moments. I HIGHLY recommend taking the time for this!
